title: On street parking shall not be permissible, unless specifically allowed in the impact assessment and mobility report
clause_text: On street parking shall not be permissible, unless specifically allowed in the impact assessment and mobility report.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
